WikimediaEditorTasksCluster.description: Database cluster to use for storing extension data. False means the cluster of the current wiki will be used.

WikimediaEditorTasksDatabase.description: Database to use for storing extension data. False means use the database of the current wiki. To use a table prefix, use '<database>-<prefix'>' format.

WikimediaEditorTasksEnabledCounters.description:
Counter classes to enable, with associated configuation. Fields:
* class: the fully qualified class name
* counter_key: the count property name associated with the counter, for storing in the DB and surfacing in the MediaWiki API
* target_counts: target counts associated with this counter
